title.jp: Bikini Armor wa Bikini Armor de Atte Bikini de wa Nai

synopsis: As they continue on their world-saving adventure, Fighter, Paladin, Mage, and Dark Elf decide to upgrade their armors to the latest version after a difficult battle in a dungeon. But what is the difference between bikini armor, and a normal bikini?

title.jp: Yuusha no Tabidachi ni wa Doushitemo Hitsuyou na Mono ga Aru

synopsis: The four heroes are summoned to an audience with the king. The world is in peril, and his royal highness orders them to go on a journey to save it. Fighter asks him for the money they need to help them prepare, but the king is a cheapskate.

title.jp: Yuusha to Iedomo Ikite Ikanakereba Naranai no de Aru

synopsis: The Special Hero Dispensation Act gives heroes the right to legally take items from treasure chests and dressers in town. When the four adventurers run out of money and can't continue their journey, they use this law to start invading the townspeople's houses, but they get a bit too greedy.

title.jp: Yuusha Taru Mono Mikaeri wo Motomete wa Ikenai

synopsis: The heroes need a key to get through a cave and continue with their adventure. But the arrogant mayor of the town has it, and he won't hand it over unless they complete the tasks he gives them. Fighter decides that this must be a trial for the heroes, and ends up doing the mayor's chores.

title.jp: Bouken no Nakaba ni Aratana Nakama ga Kuwawaru Koto wa Yoku Aru Hanashi

synopsis: The party needs the magic Ice Staff to defeat the dungeon boss. But it's too expensive, and so they decide to sell items in their inventory to get the money. The four even sell their elixirs, but soon learn a costly lesson.

title.jp: Yuusha to wa Genkai ni Idomi, Sore wo Koeru Mono de Aru

synopsis: Women, and only women, are being attacked in a nearby forest. The heroes go to try and find whoever's responsible. They're faced with a veteran opponent who hides himself in the forest while attacking with many different spells. Their armor is almost entirely blown off, but they continue to fight...

title.jp: Sakaba de Deatta Nakama ni Kado na Kitai wo Suru no wa Kinmotsu

synopsis: The party visits a tavern to find a new comrade. When Dark Elf complains that none of the candidates are any good, the rest of the party turns to her and says, “You don't get to talk!” What happened when Dark Elf first joined the party?

title.jp: Bouken no Nakaba ni Aratana Nakama ga Kuwawaru Koto wa Yoku Aru Hanashi

synopsis: Two new girls want to join the party: Hunter and Valkyrie. The two are both such unique characters that they may not be usable for anything, so the party has them fight each other, and promises to take the winner…

title.jp: Shinrai Shiteita Nakama no Uragiri ni Saishite Yuusha no Torubeki Koudou

synopsis: The party is victorious after a harsh battle, but the enemy's last spell hits Mage. Then Mage begins to scream about how she hates everyone and starts to attack the group. The battle takes an unexpected turn…

title.jp: Hoshii to Negau Item Koso Nakanaka Te ni Iranai

synopsis: The party enters a vast dungeon filled with powerful enemies, and their HP and MP are at their limits. Just as they're hoping to find a healing item, they find a treasure chest. But all the ones they've found so far have been trapped. What trap does this chest have?

title.jp: Seikishi no Shiroki Yawahada ni Semaru Juuyoku no Wana

synopsis: Paladin is filled with the spirit of self-sacrifice. One day, an awful mayor of a village says, “If you want to proceed, one of you must marry me!” Paladin responds by making the ultimate sacrifice to help the party advance.

title.jp: Hatashite Hontouni Kore de Owaru no ka wa Wareware ni mo Mada Wakaranai

synopsis: After many battles, the party's journey has reached its end. As the climax approaches, the heroes are confronted by a flood of tropes and cliches. Of course, the sexy scenes are at their climax too!
